title: Dutch Newspaper on Treaty of Versailles MCQ 2

content.question: Which of the following accurately explains the historical significance of the harsh conditions imposed on Germany that the editorial describes?

choices.label: They led to a successful communist revolution in Germany.
They triggered a massive wave of emigration from Germany.
They resulted in the virtual deindustrialization of Germany.
They encouraged the rise of political extremism in Germany.

content.answer: They encouraged the rise of political extremism in Germany.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
